notes: Marrakech, Morocco. Iconic 5-star boutique riad in the medina with legendary rooftop bar. Actively partners with fashion influencers — previously hosted a fashion retreat with influencer Astrid Zeegen-Holt. High-visibility visual property, perfect for editorial and content creators.

Marrakech, Morocco. Legendary 5-star palace hotel, one of the world's most iconic properties. Dedicated press email (French: presse@). Works with Nomad RP agency in France. Highly sought after by luxury influencers and photographers. PR agency: philippine@nomadrp.com.

Marrakech, Morocco. Ultra-luxury palace with private riads, owned by King Mohammed VI. Director of Marketing & Communications: Kenza Zizi. Email format: first.last@royalmansour.com. Favourite of celebrities and high-end content creators. Multiple influencer-worthy spaces.

Marrakech, Morocco. 5-star historical hotel in UNESCO-listed Medina with magnificent rooftop views. Dedicated media/press email confirmed. Also represented by The Agency PC in UK/France: lasultana@pc.agency. Strong visual identity ideal for model and influencer content.

Marrakech, Morocco. Ultra-luxury palace hotel outside Marrakech medina with pools, spa, and stunning Moorish architecture. 105K Instagram followers. Responsible marketing contact on staff. Ideal for wellness, luxury fashion, and lifestyle content creators.

Marrakech, Morocco. 5-star luxury riad with 7 bedrooms, heated pool, and a large terrace. 44K Instagram followers. Boutique intimate setting highly favoured by influencers and photographers. Located in Dar El Bacha neighbourhood.

Marrakech, Morocco. Historic family-owned luxury riad in the medina. Has hosted VIP guests including Brad Pitt and Tom Cruise. Manager: Kamal Bouskri. Authentic high-end boutique property, great for heritage and luxury content.

Marrakech, Morocco. Ranked #1 Riad in Africa and #5 in the world by TripAdvisor Best of the Best Small & Boutique Hotels. Luxury medina property with three pools and traditional hammam. 20K Instagram followers. Strong influencer appeal.

Fez, Morocco. 5-star Relais & Chateaux luxury hotel in the ancient medina of Fez. Dedicated press page at riadfes.com/en/press.html. Unique architectural property with traditional Moroccan craftsmanship — very visual and sought after by travel content creators.

Essaouira, Morocco. 5-star Relais & Chateaux boutique hotel. Dedicated press section on website. Atmospheric coastal city location, blue-and-white aesthetic beloved by photographers and lifestyle influencers. 33 rooms and suites.

Essaouira, Morocco. Luxury boutique hotel in the heart of the Essaouira medina. Also has separate restaurant arm (restaurant@madada.com). Known for its coastal Moroccan aesthetic, wind-swept architecture and artisanal design. Perfect for bohemian/chic lifestyle content.

Atlas Mountains (1 hour from Marrakech), Morocco. Sir Richard Branson's award-winning luxury hotel, recently reopened with 6 new riads (42 rooms total). Spectacular mountain setting with 100% Moroccan staff. Use Virgin Limited Edition press@ for all media/social collaboration requests.

Cape Town (Bantry Bay), South Africa. Relais & Chateaux ultra-boutique property with world-class art collection, wine cellar, and ocean views. Direct PR/Marketing contact: michellene@ellerman.co.za. Also represented by Imagine Global (gabriele@imagine-team.com) for USA/UK. 37K Instagram followers. Highly visual luxury property.

Cape Town, South Africa. Iconic pink landmark hotel since 1899, ranked in World's 50 Best Hotels 2024. Active partnerships with fashion designers (Thebe Magugu). Belmond Global Product Communications contact. Also via ottavia.palomba@belmond.com (Global Head of Brand Communications). Strong fashion/culture influencer scene.

Cape Town (V&A Waterfront), South Africa. Iconic waterfront luxury resort with marina views and mountain backdrop. Active media centre at oneandonlyresorts.com/media-centre. Dedicated influencer request form available. Email format: first.last@oneandonlyresorts.com.

Mahe, Seychelles. 5-star cliffside hillside resort on Petite Anse beach. Press contact: Clare Bromilow, Senior Director of PR & Communications. Four Seasons also has a dedicated influencer application portal at fourseasons.studio. Exceptional for luxury travel, fashion and lifestyle content.

Felicite Island, Seychelles. Private island ultra-luxury resort by Six Senses. Six Senses has a dedicated global PR contacts page (sixsenses.com/en/corporate/media-center/global-pr-contacts/). Unique barefoot luxury private island — exceptional for influencer editorial stays and brand campaigns.

Mahe, Seychelles. Large 5-star resort with beaches, pools and spa. Constance Hotels Africa PR rep: Michele Abraham, African Synergy (011 782 0636). Group reservation email: resa@constancehotels.com. Green Globe Platinum certified. Good fit for luxury lifestyle and family content.

Mauritius. Named 'Most Instagrammable Hotel in the World 2023' by Luxury Travel Advisor. 91K Instagram followers. The Lux Collective PR team available at press.theluxcollective.com/contacts. Ideal property for model shoots, content creators, and fashion/lifestyle influencers.

brand_name: Zanzibar White Sand Luxury Villas & Spa
notes: Paje Beach, Zanzibar, Tanzania. Family-owned Relais & Chateaux 18-villa resort. First renewable energy-powered luxury resort in East Africa. Co-founder/Sales Director: Natalia Niznik (natalia@whitesandvillas.com based on pattern). Multi-award winner including Best Luxury Beachfront Resort in Africa. Excellent for sustainable luxury influencer content.

Kendwa Beach, Zanzibar, Tanzania. 5-star eco-luxury Design Hotel, first in world with EarthCheck Sustainable Design Gold certification. 93K Instagram followers. Dedicated marketing email confirmed. Also: info@zurizanzibar.com for general contact. Perfect for eco-luxury, model campaigns, and visual content.

Mnemba Island (private island near Zanzibar), Tanzania. Ultra-exclusive private island barefoot luxury — 12 beach bandas. Part of andBeyond group (media@andbeyond.com verified). Exceptional diving, pristine beaches. Ideal for exclusive brand activations and high-end editorial shoots.

Serengeti, Tanzania. Luxury safari lodge in the heart of Serengeti with year-round wildlife access. Press contact: Trevor van de Ven (+27 011 481 6030). Four Seasons Africa PR hub in Johannesburg. Great for adventure/safari influencer campaigns and editorial content.

Maasai Mara, Kenya. Two intimate camps high above the Great Rift Valley, with 15 tented suites each. Head of Marketing: Alita Lemmer (email pattern: first@angama.com). CMO: Kate Boyd (kate@angama.com). Stunning aerial views and dramatic sunsets — one of Africa's most photogenic safari properties.

Karen, Nairobi, Kenya. World-famous boutique hotel where Nubian giraffes join guests for breakfast. 275K Instagram followers. PR contact listed as michelle@besandco.com. Has hosted Ellen DeGeneres, Naomi Watts, Ellie Goulding, Brooke Shields. One of Africa's most viral/shareable hotel experiences.

Olare Motorogi Conservancy, Maasai Mara, Kenya. Sir Richard Branson's luxury safari camp — 12 tented suites with panoramic Mara views. Use Virgin Limited Edition press@ for all media/social collaboration requests. Also: USA enquiries@virginlimitededition.com / +1 929 526 3034.

Karen, Nairobi, Kenya. Small Luxury Hotel of the World, 45 elegant suites in Nairobi's leafy suburb of Karen. PR/media rep: Lucinda at Far Horizons Marketing (+44 1242 821508). Hotel direct: nairobi@hemingwayscollection.com. Aspirational lifestyle property near Giraffe Centre and Karen Blixen Museum.

Karen, Nairobi, Kenya. Luxury boutique hotel on 2.5 acres blending African elegance with modern comfort. Also: reservations@houseofwaine.co.ke. Intimate property with colonial-African aesthetic. Great for boutique travel, lifestyle, and fashion content creators visiting Nairobi.

Gigiri, Nairobi, Kenya. 5-star luxury boutique Design Hotel in Nairobi's diplomatic quarter. Featured in Conde Nast Traveller Hot List. Email pattern: first.last@tribe-hotel.com. 30K Instagram followers. Contemporary art-driven design hotel — good fit for fashion-forward and design influencers.

Diani Beach, Kenya. Three exclusive-use luxury villas (Cliff, Garden, Beach) on the edge of Diani Beach. Renowned as one of Kenya's and the world's top luxury villas. Perfect for exclusive model campaign shoots, private villa content, high-end swimwear/fashion editorial.

Volcanoes National Park, Rwanda. Ultra-luxury 8-suite lodge adjacent to gorilla habitat. PR Manager: Lisa Carey, lisa.c@singita.com. Singita operates 19 lodges across Africa — general enquiries: enquiries@singita.com. Exceptional for conservation-focused luxury brands and once-in-a-lifetime content.

Volcanoes National Park, Rwanda. Award-winning eco-lodge with six villa suites near mountain gorilla habitat. Part of Wilderness (formerly Wilderness Safaris). Press room: wildernessdestinations.com/press-room. Reservations: +27 (0) 21 794 9050. Exceptional conservation-led luxury property for impactful content.

Makgadikgadi Pans, Botswana. Iconic desert luxury camp by Uncharted Africa Safari Co. Marketing email confirmed (marketing@unchartedafrica.com). Also: reservations@unchartedafrica.com, +27 (0)11 326 4407. Surreal salt pans, meerkats, migration — extraordinary visual backdrop for model/editorial content.

Okavango Delta, Botswana. Luxury tented camp in the heart of the Okavango Delta. Part of andBeyond (media@andbeyond.com verified). Also: trade.enquiry@andbeyond.com. andBeyond operates 29 luxury lodges across Africa. Perfect for safari influencer content in one of Africa's most spectacular ecosystems.

Sabi Sand Game Reserve, South Africa. Sir Richard Branson's all-inclusive private game reserve with Rock Lodge and Safari Lodge. Use Virgin Limited Edition press@ for all media/social collaboration requests. Big 5 access, extraordinary views, strong influencer appeal for luxury safari content.

Medjumbe Island, Quirimbas Archipelago, Mozambique. Exclusive 12-villa private island resort. Anantara Africa PR: Mabel Modipa, Public Relations Manager for Africa at Minor Hotels (mmodipa@minor.com). Direct resort reservations: +27 010 003 8977. Pristine Indian Ocean private island — ideal for exclusive campaign shoots.

Nanyuki, Mount Kenya, Kenya. Historic 5-star safari lodge founded by William Holden, on the equator at 7,000 ft. Accor/Fairmont Press contact for Middle East, Africa & Turkey: Cybelle Daou at Cybelle.DAOU@accor.com. Hotel reservations: kenya.reservations@fairmont.com. Unique Equator crossing and wildlife sanctuary on property.

Marrakech, Morocco. Boutique luxury riad and wellness retreat in the medina. Active Instagram presence (@riadlavie). Intimate riad format ideal for wellness, yoga retreat, and small group influencer partnerships. Strong visual content opportunities.

Volcanoes National Park, Rwanda. 21 exclusive lodges swathed in eucalyptus forest with volcano views. One&Only Media Centre: oneandonlyresorts.com/media-centre. Email format: first.last@oneandonlyresorts.com. Perfect for luxury adventurer influencers, sustainable travel content, and once-in-a-lifetime gorilla trekking narratives.
